Items.Title: A Local Law to amend the administrative code of the city of New York, in relation to extending whistleblower protection for officers and employees of city contractors and subcontractors.
Items.ActionText: This Introduction was Hearing Held by Committee
Items.MatterName: Extending whistleblower protection for officers and employees of city contractors and subcontractors.

Items.Title: A Local Law to amend the administrative code of the city of New York, in relation to requiring city contractors and subcontractors to post information concerning their employees' reporting of fraud, false claims, criminality or corruption and their whistleblower protection rights.
Items.ActionText: This Introduction was Hearing Held by Committee
Items.MatterName: Requiring city contractors and subcontractors to post information concerning their employees' reporting of fraud, false claims, criminality or corruption and their whistleblower protection rights.

Items.Title: A Local Law to amend the administrative code of the city of New York, in relation to the New York city false claims act.

Items.MatterName: New York city false claims act.
